image.altText: A man in aan open neck shirt and suit jacket speaking at a podium.

props.synopsis: The premier's comment comes in the wake of Ms Bates yelling out "cross your legs" while Health Minister Shannon Fentiman was speaking in parliament earlier this week.

image.altText: A person scrolling social media platform X on their mobile.

image.altText: A beared man takes a selfie with a woman in a black cap

image.altText: Paul Minuzzo wears a button-up shirt.
